title: Every Champion's ult has been replaced with UPGRADE!!! Make ults out of basic abilities!
body:
For example, {{champion:157}} Sweeping Blade temporaily gains AD scaling and 40/50/75% on target CDR
So, lots and lots of dashing (instead of 6 sec at max rank, you only need like 1.25 seconds to dash on the same target)
Try to be creative, increasing damage is fine, but just adding +9999 damage is a low hanging fruit
